text:
The constructor for org.apache.batik.util.SoftDoublyIndexedTable.Entry
references a member variable (referenceQueue) of 
org.apache.batik.util.SoftDoublyIndexedTable.  JBuilder 4's compiler will
complain that you can't reference that variable before calling the 
base class constructor.  Apparently other compilers don't mind.

Passing referenceQueue as an explicit argument to Entry's constructor
eliminated the warning.

cvs -z6 diff SoftDoublyIndexedTable.java (in directory D:\apache-xml\xml-
batik\sources\org\apache\batik\util\)
